text:
See summary. 
The Use Taglib floater won't show any taglibs. Changing the port back to 8080 and restarting Tomcat and Udev will make them available again.
creator: mjmare@webtothemax.com
dmandell@stanford.edu
text:
Documentation states that by default CTLX checks "localhost:8080" for the 
Tomcat HTTP connection. The procedure for changing the extension's 
configuration is described in the documentation under "Configuring CTLX for 
Tomcat" under "Things to Watch".
